# attributedText

**Instance Property**

The styled text that the text field displays.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying @MainActor var attributedText: NSAttributedString? { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property is `nil` by default. Assigning a new value to this property also replaces the value of the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITextField/text] property with the same string data, albeit without any formatting information. In addition, assigning a new value updates the values in the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITextField/font], [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITextField/textColor], and other style-related properties so that they reflect the style information starting at location `0` in the attributed string.

## Configuring the text attributes

- **text**: The text that the text field displays.
- **placeholder**: The string that displays when there is no other text in the text field.
- **attributedPlaceholder**: The styled string that displays when there is no other text in the text field.
- **defaultTextAttributes**: The default attributes to apply to the text.
- **font**: The font of the text.
- **textColor**: The color of the text.
- **textAlignment**: The technique for aligning the text.
- **typingAttributes**: The attributes to apply to new text that the user enters.
- **UITextField.BorderStyle**: The type of border around the text field.
